EnumProperty.Name: LIBTYPE_SUFFIX
EnumProperty.Description: Use dynamically-linked-build of wxWidgets (*.dll) or statically-linked-build of wxWidgets (*.lib)?

EnumProperty.Name: wxMSVC_VERSION
EnumProperty.Description: [Optional] Only define if you built wxWidgets with wxMSVC_VERSION defined, see include/msvc/wx/setup.h; setting this option will define wxMSVC_VERSION and use approprate library directory.

BoolProperty.Name: PrintMSBuildVars
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Print MS Build Variables during compile?
BoolProperty.Description: For diagnosis into wxWidgets unresolved external errors, when enabled, during the build this prints the compile, link, and resource include directories, the preprocessor definitions, and prints the list of libraries linked to.

BoolProperty.Name: BuildwxWidgets
BoolProperty.Description: Builds wxWidgets library using options above. If target wxWidgets configuration is already built then disable this option to speed up compilation. Builds with appropriate arguments (more exist but the author didn't make a front end for them here): USE_GDIPLUS=1 BUILD=$(Configuration) TARGET_CPU=AMD64 SHARED=0 COMPILER_PREFIX=vc$(wxMSVC_VERSION).
